scripts.cypress:open:live: start-server-and-test 'yarn cypress:start' http://localhost:3000 'yarn cypress open --env networkMode=live'
scripts.cypress:run:live: start-server-and-test 'yarn cypress:start' http://localhost:3000 'yarn cypress run --env networkMode=live'
scripts.cypress:run:capture: start-server-and-test 'yarn cypress:start' http://localhost:3000 'yarn cypress run --env networkMode=capture'
scripts.cypress:run:stub: start-server-and-test 'yarn cypress:start' http://localhost:3000 'yarn cypress run --env networkMode=stub'
